text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Suzuka?!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff... J-just a dream...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
There's not much time until the<n>Takarazuka Kinen, so we're
hard at<n>work, training for the big day.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Squee! She's so fast, right fromthe start! I never get tired of watchingSuzuka run.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
A style all her own, but one admired<n>by racers everywhere!
I get<n>goosebumps just standing here!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her sudden sprint right out the gate is<n>a key part of Silence
Suzuka's<n>trademark style.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It looks like she's making a mad<n>dash for the finish line, yet
she's<n>nowhere near it.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Normal racers would slow down to<n>conserve their stamina
by now, but<n>not her! She's just getting started!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As if impelled by those words, Silence<n>Suzuka's cleats kick
harder against<n>the ground, sending her flying down<n>the
course even faster.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Wooow! Her speed just shot up<n>again!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Watching her run is like being in a<n>dream. Fans and racers
alike can't<n>contain their excitement—and to be<n>honest, I'm
can't quite hold it back<n>myself.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With every lap, she gets<n>better—faster. At this rate there's
no<n>telling how far she'll—

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
You and Suzuka seek to boldly go<n>where no racer has gone
before. The<n>ideal you search for may even lie<n>beyond an
Umamusume's<n>capabilities.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: But when you cross that threshold,<n>her legs...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Suzuka?!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I-is something wrong, Trainer?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: N-no, it's nothing.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: N-no, it's nothing.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Huff... Phew...

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Welcome back, Suzuka! That's<n>another record!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Yes, I had a feeling I was going<n>faster. Everything just felt
right.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
At this rate, you're a shoo-in for the<n>Takarazuka Kinen!
Don't you think,<n>Trainer?!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: ...Y-yeah, for sure.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: ...Y-yeah, for sure.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Since my talk with Agnes Tachyon,<n>I've been on a constant
quest for<n>resources on racing injuries.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Is there any way to predict an<n>incident? And if something
happens,<n>what sort of future can Suzuka<n>expect?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I had hoped research would alleviate<n>my worries, but the
more I read, the<n>more anxious I grow...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
(This racer absolutely destroyed the<n>competition in her
debut race. But her<n>second race...)

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
(She started out great—amazing even.<n>Everything was going
smoothly as<n>she entered the homestretch...)

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
(That's when she suddenly collapsed<n>and had to withdraw.
Medical exams<n>revealed her legs had fractured from<n>the
strain of her running... She had to<n>retire.)

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
(This runner was in the middle of a<n>race on a winning streak
in her senior<n>year. She sped up early on the final<n>corner,
hoping to overtake the others<n>from the outside.)

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
(But she suddenly slowed down...<n>She couldn't even cross
the finish<n>line.)

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: (She had to pull out of racing... And<n>she never returned.)

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
(No matter where I look, stories of<n>hopes and dreams being
dashed in an<n>instant keep popping up.)

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: (To think Umamusume are walking<n>such a fine line...)

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: (To think Umamusume are walking<n>such a fine line...)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Excuse me.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Suzuka?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She should be finishing up dinner by<n>now, yet she's
standing in front of me<n>in her tracksuit.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She must plan on doing some solo<n>training. Again, she
shows how<n>devoted she is to going faster and<n>farther
than any racer before her.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Um, Trainer, maybe it's just me, but<n>you seem to be staying
late a lot<n>lately...

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Is there... something wrong with my<n>current skill set? Are
you... worried I<n>won't win the Takarazuka as I am<n>now?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: (Not at all... In fact, there isn't a raceyou can't win as you are now.)

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: (Not at all... In fact, there isn't a raceyou can't win as you are now.)

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: (The way you run, the power youpossess—it's almost overwhelming.Too overwhelming...)

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: (The way you run, the power youpossess—it's almost overwhelming.Too overwhelming...)

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yes?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Her brow furrows as she awaits my<n>answer.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She's gone through so much to<n>achieve her dream. She
even switched<n>teams...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Do I have any right to stop her? To<n>ruin her dreams? Doubt
clouds my<n>mind as I try in vain to find the<n>answer.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Um... I'm not staying late for any<n>particular reason... More
importantly,<n>how are you feeling? Any issues with<n>your
legs?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Um... I'm not staying late for any<n>particular reason... More
importantly,<n>how are you feeling? Any issues with<n>your
legs?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Are you, by chance, worried I'm<n>overdoing it?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Then I assure you, I'm fine. Seeing<n>as it's just before a
race, I'm being<n>even more cautious than usual.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
What's more, I feel the best I ever<n>have. There's not a
single worry in<n>my head.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: After all, I have—

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She stops, and her gentle expression<n>genuinely appears
free of doubt or<n>worry.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
Anyway... I'm going to go for a run.<n>Please don't stay too
late.
choice_data_list: All right. You be careful outside.
All right. You be careful outside.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text:
...Trainer, I can't wait to see what sort<n>of scenery we find at
the Takarazuka<n>Kinen.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Up until now, we've been chasing<n>after the scenery she
seeks together...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
What sort of view will she show me<n>at the Takarazuka
Kinen?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
What sort of view will she show me<n>at the Takarazuka
Kinen?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Will it be a view of her crossing the<n>finish line in record
time?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Or perhaps I'll see her as the epitome<n>of strength, besting
racers with double<n>her experience...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Still in the lead is Silence Suzuka!<n>She's nearing the large
zelkova tree<n>marking the third corner!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: (Stop that! Nothing like that is going to<n>happen!)

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
(I need to do more research. If I can<n>just find some
common thread, I can<n>use that to stop—)

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Suddenly, something feels wrong. I<n>should be looking at the
documents in<n>front of me, but...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Everything's... going black...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Everything's... going black...
